DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics ( drug absorb body , distribute within body remove body time ) single dose JNJ-39758979 healthy Japanese volunteer multiple dos JNJ-39758979 healthy Japanese Caucasian volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Single Multiple Dose Study Explore Safety Pharmacokinetics JNJ-39758979 In Healthy Male Volunteers Either Caucasian Japanese Descent
DOC.detailed_description: This study ass safety pharmacokinetics JNJ-39758979 placebo ( look like drug study active ingredient ) healthy volunteer . This study conduct two part . Part 1 randomized ( study drug assign chance ) , double-blind ( neither physician volunteer know identity assign drug ) study evaluate safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics single dos JNJ-39758979 placebo 36 healthy Japanese male volunteer . Part 2 randomized , double-blind study evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics multiple dos JNJ-39758979 placebo 24 healthy Japanese male 24 healthy Caucasian male . For Part 1 , participation period maximum 56 day , include screen visit , 7-day in-clinic period two follow-up visit . For Part 2 , participation period maximum 202 day , include screen visit , 17-day in-clinic period two follow-up visit . For part study , safety evaluation , include ECG ( cardiac function test ) , vital sign monitor side-effects perform . Additionally , blood urine sample collect evaluation . Part 1 : volunteer receive single oral ( mouth ) dose JNJ-39758979 ( 50 , 100 , 300 , 600mg ) placebo ; Part 2 : volunteer receive oral dose JNJ-39758979 ( 300 mg ) placebo day 14 day .
DOC.criteria: Must generally good health If japanese , must live outside Japan 5 year whose parent grandparents Japanese Have negative result HIV , hepatitis B , hepatitis C Must willing use acceptable method birth control 6 month last dose donate sperm study 6 month last dose Must negative test alcohol drug abuse checkin History alcohol drug abuse within last 5 year ( consume 14 drink per week ) Average consumption 3 cup caffeinated beverage ( tea/coffee/cocoa/cola ) per day Use vitamin , herbal supplement , energy drink St.John 's Wort ( hypericin ) 14 day first dose Receipt experimental drug medical device within last month
